name: Number 3: Cicada King
text:
2 Level 3 monsters
If the battle position of this card is changed (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon 1 Insect monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position. When a monster on the field activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target that monster; negate its effects, then choose 1 Insect monster on the field, and either make it gain 500 DEF or change its battle position. You can only use each effect of "Number 3: Cicada King" once per turn.
